comment: Version of ~ bj-elisset with a disjoint variable condition on ` x , V ` . This proof uses only ~ df-ex , ~ ax-gen , ~ ax-4 and ~ df-clel on top of propositional calculus. Prefer its use over ~ bj-elisset when sufficient. (Contributed by BJ, 14-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
